website_summaries.verdict: A 4-pack of 2-inch wide occlusion training bands that are made from elastic fabric.
pros: These affordable occlusion training bands are comfortable and are manufactured utilizing an elastic material that expands and contracts with your muscles without sacrificing tightness
The bands also feature a loop that allows you to secure any excess band after tightening
cons: The buckles are a little large and cumbersome and the lack of markings makes it hard to workout with consistent pressure from day to day

customer_reviews.title: They work!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 30 year old out of shape women with no muscle definition, but I use these during my boxing classes. After 15 minutes with these on my arms the veins in my hands and forearms were literally bulging. My classmates thought I was having a bad reaction to my prework. You will notice the immediate pump effect. I felt like wonderwoman
customer_reviews.author: Marrita

customer_reviews.title: These are acceptional I’m getting results
customer_reviews.text: I’m a professional bodybuilder and these are great!!! I see to many people complaining on the product. If they are used properly you will definately get the results you want!! I even ordered a second set because I’m so satisfied!! Just like anything else you will get wear and tear on them!!!
customer_reviews.author: jeremy d.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended !
customer_reviews.text: These bands give a great resistance, made my muscles POP! Can’t beat the price and more expensive brands offer nothing more!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cami

customer_reviews.title: super easy to put on and the pump is amazing
customer_reviews.text: super easy to put on and the pump is amazing. the material used is perfect for a snug good fit. after 15 min and a huge bicep pump my limbs weren't blue.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: They do their job, like the thickness really like the product.
customer_reviews.author: Victor rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product! Great results, just one issue..
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, you get a great build up of lactic acids, veins bulge, you feel the soreness and just know you’re going to see results. You’re sore in 2 sets, instead of after 4. The material is nice, thick and comfortable. The only thing stopping it from being a 5 star product is the way you have to put it on. My arms measure 17.5 inches, so I have to open it up quite a bit, then when I put them on it’s hard to tighten with one arm. I have to use my teeth then clamp it, if it wasn’t for that, it’s be an easy 5 star, but I look forward to using these some more.
customer_reviews.author: Abdul

customer_reviews.title: Best value
customer_reviews.text: You get 2 sets for less than the price of one of other brands with on par quality
customer_reviews.author: Steve Van Rensum

customer_reviews.title: They seem to be made very well
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to using these, I just received them, for me they fit well. I have never used bands like this, but as far as the quality of the product they are nice and comfortable, they stretch well. For the money I paid the quality is great. I start using them at the gym today. UPDATE:I have used these a week and I do feel a workout for arms that seems to be felt after better than before, much more than just using weight machines alone. My goal this summer is better arms, so I like this a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Jacques7

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Workmanship
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to order anything other than BFR brand but I took a chance because it was good price for a 4-pack (legs and arms) and frankly, they were pretty cool looking. I was not disappointed. the bands are heavy duty and well made. Would definitely buy again. Customer service was great with fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: returning them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to try occlusion training. I found these bands to be way to stretchy...feel wimpy to me. With a lot of pull on the straps, I still didn't feel like I got enough tension. I had tried doing some work previously using floss bands, to see what it would feel like, and found good pump from that, but that takes a lot of time to do. I would guess that the elastic would get worn out within a short time, and the buckle probably won't be able to hold the straps after a couple of months. I am returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Wally s

customer_reviews.title: The design of these bands is terrible. The elastic bands themselves are too short and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 6 different occlusion bands to compare them. The design of these bands is terrible. The elastic bands themselves are too short and the buckles are huge and cumbersome. It makes closing the bands around your bicep a workout in and of itself. If you had a lifting partner that could wrap them around and buckle them for you they would be usable but by yourself it is difficult. I would recommend any other occlusion band over these.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Mann

customer_reviews.title: They will add gains!
customer_reviews.text: When wearing these bands, it takes me half as long to feel the swell during my workouts. It allows me to power through my third set with a lot of difficulty, where without the bands 3 sets wasn’t even a challenge unless I went up in weight, but that would challenge me on the first set. I’m actually seeing an increase in strength and muscle, without having to add a dangerous amount of weight. The only problem is, when putting them on your own arms, it is so easy to pinch yourself with the band or the clip. It’s also difficult to get the right tightness on your own.
customer_reviews.author: Jerika

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I just bought these and have only worn to gym twice so far. They feel like good quality materials, they’re comfortable, and they do their job without digging into your skin. My only complaint is that they should have made 2 of them longer. They say it goes to 33” stretched, which already isn’t huge(I’m 5’11” 185lbs) and the place it supposed to go on my legs is 27” so it’s kind of a pain to put on, and they’re going to bebputting the elastic to the test every time they’re in use. Would definitely buy again, great price on what I’m hoping continues to be a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Skjerpen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Straps
customer_reviews.text: My first time utilizing these type of bands and I must say they are fantastic and work as prescribed. Takes some getting used to but I have already utilized on 3 workouts and the pump is just amazing. The straps are strongly made and easy to place on your arms and legs. I highly recommend the straps for BFR training. The buckles snap up and down easily.
customer_reviews.author: 747Marine

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy! LOVE! MUST BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast & the quality is amazing! Only downside was there wasn’t any directions for use or suggested workouts. It took some time to figure these out to make sure I was using them appropriately but after I had it down I was able to feel quality! Love this purchase! Also, I had hip surgery last year and this helped me reach my goal with little to no pain! I can’t wait to begin week two and see more results!
customer_reviews.author: Juliana

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful product.
customer_reviews.text: Allow me to write an honest review for this product. These bands are wonderful. YOU DO KOT GET OVERNIGHT RESULTS. You do see results over time. I already had strong legs before ordering this product so I don’t see much change there just yet. I notice the most results in my arms. I seriously like these bands and I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Horton

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I.ike these. They are great quality and easy to use. They don’t really come with any instructions. I watched some video’s on YouTube to see how to use them. They do work on preventing the burn of muscle fatigue but beware because it’s a fine lineof being too tight. Then you can almost black out.
customer_reviews.author: BuyerL

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product, Uncomfortable, Doesn't Work, Buy Any Other Bands
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few different products to try out this was the worst out of all of them. It's uncomfortable, and hard to use because it's difficult to tighten the straps and then release them after each set. And when you do tighten them it intensely pinches your skin making it painful. It's hard to use, painful and ruins the workout and they won't let me return the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Built right and can get tight!
customer_reviews.text: Well made...If I had one thing to improve on these bands...I'd make the arm bands a few inches longer. The great thing is they send 2 sets...arms and legs. They are really quality made bands...I'd recommend them without a! doubt
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Barkley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These bands are very easy to use, and they are soft enough and wide enough to provide a comfortable fit even when pulled tighter. That's about the gist of it, and we are very pleased with them. I recommend this product based on our experience.
customer_reviews.author: P. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!!
customer_reviews.text: I used BFR bands first but these work exactly the same for a better price. You get an arm set and a leg set. I'm small enough that the arm bands fit on my legs so super happy about that!
customer_reviews.author: India A.

customer_reviews.title: Solid, but flexible material. Excellent width.
customer_reviews.text: Still adjusting to this type of training. The clamping and the width of the fabric is why I initially chose this product. Wrist or knee wraps are too wide and stiff, especially for the upper arm. I also did not want to risk injury by using bands, which can be easily over-tightened. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: BRAVO

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Buckles are bulky and bands are hard to tighten especially On the arms. They get tight and are sturdy but not very easy to use. I’d prefer a Velcro levy design
customer_reviews.author: Cary Chase

customer_reviews.title: Her/ Him
customer_reviews.text: These straps are long, and cannot be cut because then shredded. The bulk clip is uncomfortable. These are for big body builders.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: I have used MANY training aids throughout the years. This product is not only affordable, simple and high quality, but it is also very stylish. May sound ignorant, but style matters. Will definitely be looking into more of their products!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Carter

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst bands I have ever tried. They are too wide and way too difficult to tighten. I will be reordering a different brand that I had used before these. I wish I hadn’t ordered these because I wanted green. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hockemeier

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get the tightening that I needed to make the occlusion training functional. I thought the design of the the bands themselves was lacking with regard to functionality. Maybe if you had a partner to help you tighten it would work ok, but I train alone most of the time. The carrying case is nice though.
customer_reviews.author: LaKeisha C. Kanen

customer_reviews.title: Cool Design, Bad Implementation
customer_reviews.text: These things in theory would help you perform occlusion training. But the straps are really uncomfortable and pinch your skin (leaving marks) so you basically don't want to use them. Waste of money. I would look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Beards

customer_reviews.title: great purchase
customer_reviews.text: the bands look great and im sure it will work great to get some training in, i like the quality and these are really easy and simple to user. great product so far
customer_reviews.author: ivan

customer_reviews.title: Alright!
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use. Sometimes it is not necessarily comfortable (because its materials?). I would recommend to buy it. It can be used pretty much in your whole life!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Very good reliable product. I started researching occlusion training and wanted to try it and this kit had it all. All 4 straps, 2 arms and 2 legs come in a bag that keeps it organized. I felt the difference right away working out with them. They are easy to use and I release them in between workouts and tighten them right back up with ease before I lift.
customer_reviews.author: Brennon Chancellor

customer_reviews.title: Bands are simple to use, and somewhat effective.
customer_reviews.text: The bands seem to work a bit, but I haven’t seen the massive gains espoused by users. I’m 53 and always was a hard-gainer, so that may be part of it.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy O. Werner

customer_reviews.title: Straps
customer_reviews.text: The mechanism is difficult sometimes. These will probably hold up better than Velcro but Velcro is much easier. Also when you get them tight the plastic portion often pinches. It’s well made but I would rather have a Velcro pair.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying.
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with the insufficent amount of tension that can be applied with these. Even when maxed out it’s still a 3-4. Gimmicky product and not able to be to tightened with any real tension for proper BFR training. #PowerAthlete #BattleTheBS #JackedStreet
customer_reviews.author: Tray_Caddy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Bands
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy comfortable bands. Looking forward to using these for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Poetic Justice

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Material
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my husband and he loves it! The quality is good, elasticity is good, and the ability to adjust makes it fit comfortably. It arrived timely (next day) and we received an email notification with a picture of the package on our door step. He says he would order other products from this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: dollface906

customer_reviews.title: BEST value
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been using these for almost a year now, and they're still in great shape, are sturdy, easy to adjust, and overall an awesome purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Feels like they are working
customer_reviews.text: Well I love the gorilla on the band,but the strap covers it lol. Other than that, I keep my pump as long as they're on. Which I feel my arms are heavier. I'll be back in a few weeks, as for now nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Do not consider any other BFR bands! These are cheaper in price, but not quality! I love them! Great customer service as well!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony F. Amato Jr

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and I can tell a difference nice product
customer_reviews.author: janel

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome, the pump is unreal and leaves your arms throbbing with half the weight . I love these so much, I bought a pair for my trainer, who equally loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L

customer_reviews.title: Pinches skin when tightening.
customer_reviews.text: Could not put these things on And tighten them without pinching my skin. Even with a shirt sleeve underneath.
customer_reviews.author: DJN

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Took me a while to get used to the buckle. But these work good. Just wish the arms bands were just a little bit longer. But I can't complain
customer_reviews.author: R. Kraft

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed so far!
customer_reviews.text: I've only used them twice but so far they have exceeded my expectations. They appear to be well made of high quality products. I think they will be just what I was looking for. Thanks for the excellent product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nu-world Electronics

customer_reviews.title: Biggest I have ever gotten with my arms
customer_reviews.text: I used for the very first time I got such a great pump my arms where about to explode
customer_reviews.author: Robin Muscle girl

customer_reviews.title: Blah
customer_reviews.text: Like that it's cheap but to hold is hard since it can't grip correctly since its velcro and with too much force will open up. Defeats purpose when it pops up
customer_reviews.author: Amitt

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: They do what they are supposed to. Seem good quality
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping great item.
customer_reviews.text: Great item ordered this item for a friend he likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Kavashansky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This item was bought for my Husband and he is very pleased with them .
customer_reviews.author: Ang Kripp

customer_reviews.title: Product totally worth buying
customer_reviews.text: I use them to work the biceps, and leg muscle more.
customer_reviews.author: J J

customer_reviews.title: Work Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Used these for a couple of workouts so far, the results are great. The Pump is amazing. Easy to use help too.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: These work pretty well, but I have small limbs. I’m not sure that they’d work well for all sizes. Def go through the other reviews before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put on
customer_reviews.text: Hard to put on and leg band could go around my leg twice. Definitely for the hard core bodybuilder
customer_reviews.author: S. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Building and toning
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully final piece of puzzle to building biceps and triceps. Only used 2 times so far looking forward to results 6 months later.
customer_reviews.author: Skillet66

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: These work just as well as the higher end name brands. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: LD Burton

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Little bit too much give in the bands. They are comfortable but hard to get on by yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Does what the description stated and very durable and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Frazier

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: work exactly as I expected. Very good quality, seems very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far I like the way the bands fit and are easy to adjust. I will use them for a month with my workouts and then do an update.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not much more you could ask for
customer_reviews.text: they’re BFR bands and they do the job. could be a little less stretchy to really restrict bf but that could all be fixed my just making it tighter. All in all great product, and looks pretty cool as well
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: It does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. You got to Know how to adjust these to restrict the bloodflow
customer_reviews.author: Luis Pelaez

customer_reviews.title: You should try
customer_reviews.text: I work well Pump fantastic Help muscle growth Feel better strong
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Usable given the sturdy clamps but the rubber looses its form quite quickly
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what about the other competitors - this one is relatively cheap but looses its form quite quickly. It's still usable given the sturdy clamps
customer_reviews.author: Shamba

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: These are really like some superior quality bands. I was totally expecting them to just do the jobs but, I see they will do that and more!
customer_reviews.author: Mwrease2013

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what they are supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Do what they are intended to do. Worth every penny. Great pump!
customer_reviews.author: jreese

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Only used them once both for legs and arms. I definitely feel the pump I can tell already they were well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: gerald

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical Buyer
customer_reviews.text: didnt think these would work but have been pleasantly surprised at the lower weight i was using with these bands and getting sore the nest day.
customer_reviews.author: G-Daddy

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I don’t like is the giant clip
customer_reviews.text: They work well when you can get them on. The only thing I don’t like is the giant clip....it gets in the way and can be uncomfortable if not adjusted correctly
customer_reviews.author: Akhil Burroughs

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: Great product really does give you excellent pumps without having to use heavy weights and damage your joints
customer_reviews.author: Derrick J Harris

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality fast shipping excited to see pump, have used 2 times and just trial and error as to how tight.
customer_reviews.author: colqueta

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love to workout with this bandages around my legs I felt secure and stronger...good support for arms too...😍😍😍😍
customer_reviews.author: Veronica l.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: straps are shorter than expected... takes two to wrap around my legs
customer_reviews.author: minecraft

customer_reviews.title: Quality is really good for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price they’re really good . Can’t go wrong
customer_reviews.author: john picone

customer_reviews.title: Great Product/ Customer service
customer_reviews.text: Product works great. Business owners seem to really care about customers opinions. I like that.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Y.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love it help a lot with the muscle growth
customer_reviews.author: Keila depina

customer_reviews.title: Quick service
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and very reasonable price for 2 arm bfr’s and 2 leg bfr’s
customer_reviews.author: Gerald langlois

customer_reviews.title: Comes with convenient carry bag
customer_reviews.text: Good solid product! Fast shipping! Will definitely order from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: William Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Good job 🌟
customer_reviews.text: Already noticing peak in short and long head of biceps. Pumps are noticeable and amplifies the effect of oral AAS and pump products currently being ran. I can focus on targeting the bicep by guaging the muscles fullness and adjust the strap for added constriction as well. The large plastic buckles don't bother me, Im a big guy and I only enhances the process of my arms. Good job 🌟!
customer_reviews.author: ANDREW C.DUDLEY

customer_reviews.title: Not a bargain
customer_reviews.text: Elastic is of a very cheap nature subject to runs in the fabric. Clamps have no traction capabilities and rely on the friction of the weaving through the clamps to hold them in place making it hard to adjust them correctly on your own. Lasted for about a month.
customer_reviews.author: James Green

product_meta.title: Stargoods Occlusion Bands, Restriction of Blood Flow Muscle Straps Training for Arms and Legs, 4 Pack
feature_bullets: 🏆 TRAINING BANDS: This pack includes 2 bands for the arms (standard length) and 2 for the legs (extra length). Quick release bands are the most effective way to build muscle.
💪 BICEP BANDS: These occlusion tourniquets, just like the Kaatsu device training, increase muscle cell swelling in a short period of time, growing your muscles.
🏋️ MUSCLE GROWTH: Conventional training focus on lifting heavy weights. Occlusion training has shown to achieve extra muscle with lighter weights.
🤸 ADJUSTABLE COMPRESSION: During a tourniquet bands workout, muscle cells reach a point where they are so full of fluid that they have to either burst or grow.
✔️ ULTRA COMFORT: Made of premium elastic fabric that expands and contracts with the muscle without losing tightness or giving up comfort during each rep.
